#include<stdio.h>#include<queue>#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring>#include<cmath>#include<algorithm>using namespace std; int m,n;const int INF =100000000;typedef pair<int,int> P;char maze[200][200];int sx,sy;int gx,gy;int d[200][200];void panduan(int m,int n){    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)    for(int j=0;j<m;j++){        if(maze[i][j]=='S'){            sx=i;            sy=j;        }        if(maze[i][j]=='G'){            gx=i;            gy=j;        }    }}int dx[4]={1,0,-1,0},dy[4]={0,1,0,-1};int bfs(){    queue <P> que;    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)    for(int j=0;j<n;j++){        d[i][j]=INF;    }    que.push(P(sx,sy));//å°†èµ·ç‚¹åŠ å…¥å¯¹åˆ—ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è®¾ç½®å…¶è·ç¦»ä¸º0    d[sx][sy]=0;    while(que.size()){        P p=que.front();        que.pop();        if(p.first==gx&&p.second==gy)break;        for(int i=0;i<4;i++){            int nx=p.first+dx[i];            int ny=p.second+dy[i];            if(0<=nx&&nx<n&&0<=ny&&ny<m&&maze[nx][ny]!='#'&&d[nx][ny]==INF){                que.push(P(nx,ny));                d[nx][ny]=d[p.first][p.second]+1;            }        }    }    return d[gx][gy];}int main(){    //freopen("t.txt","r",stdin);    scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)    for(int j=0;j<n;j++){        scanf("%c",&maze[i][j]);    }    panduan(m,n);    int res=bfs();    printf("%d
